data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Natore, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Natore, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Natore who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, remind your church in Natore, Rajshahi, Bangladesh that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,138 believers in Natore to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 2,138 believers in Natore.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Natore, Rajshahi, Bangladesh find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Natore.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Natore
location.people_groups_list: Pundari, Tirendaj, Brahmin Utkal, Rajbansi (Muslim traditions), Mirzakhani
